## Block.setCollapsed() method

Set whether the block is collapsed or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setCollapsed(collapsed: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collapsed | boolean | True if collapsed. |

**Returns:**

void
